00019 template<typename T>
00020 class ViewFactory : public AbstractViewFactory {
00021 public:
00022     ViewFactory() {;}
00023     virtual ~ViewFactory() {;}
00024 
00025     virtual boost::shared_ptr<View> create_new_view_instance(const WorldInformation& world_information) const {
00026         boost::shared_ptr<View> result(new T);
00027         result->init(world_information);
00028         return result;
00029     }
00030 };
